H0.text: How hurricanes formed long ago can be learned by studying fossils.

H1.text: How the solar system was formed is what can be learned by studying fossils.

H2.text: The cause of strong earthquakes can be learned by studying fossils.

H3.text: How Earth's environments have changed can be learned by studying fossils.

A4.text: The fossil record is the main tool used by scientists to study the history of life and assess the diversification of life over time.

A5.text: Through the fossil record, paleobiogeography can monitor the evolution and coevolution of life on Earth, associating patterns with geological events and over long timescales
